definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Popularization of compulsory pre-school education should be given priority.
sentences.chinese: 义务教育应优先提高学前教育。

sentences.english: This means they will also have access to compulsory education for free.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着非京籍学生今后也可以在京免费义务教育。

sentences.english: All Chinese now have access to free compulsory education.
sentences.chinese: 所有的中国居民都能享受免费义务教育。

sentences.english: Article 18 The State applies a system of nine-year compulsory education.
sentences.chinese: 第十八条国家实行九年制义务教育制度。

sentences.english: The education of the nine-year system in China is free.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，九年制义务教育是免费的。

sentences.english: We will promote the balanced development of compulsory education.
sentences.chinese: 促进义务教育均衡发展。

sentences.english: As the non-compulsory education, the early childhood education development is facing the difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 作为非义务教育，幼儿教育的发展正面临艰难困境。

sentences.english: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.chinese: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.english: We need to work hard to make nine-year compulsory education more widely available and consolidate past progress.
sentences.chinese: 要大力普及和巩固九年义务教育。

sentences.english: The investigation undertaken is a piece of basic research on the development of curriculum of compulsory education in the special school for mental retardation.
sentences.chinese: 本调查为培智学校义务教育课程研制的基础研究。

sentences.english: The Chinese government introduced its compulsory nine-year education program in 1986.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府从1986年开始实行九年制义务教育。

sentences.english: We should decrease the drop-out rate at school by promoting compulsory education.
sentences.chinese: 我们要通过推行义务教育来不断降低失学率。

sentences.english: Universal education means85percent school-aged children could receive ninew-year universal education.
sentences.chinese: 普九，即为85%适龄儿童能够接受到九年义务教育。

sentences.english: Increasing input to achieve nine-year compulsory education.
sentences.chinese: 加大投入，实现全国“九年制义务教育”。

sentences.english: Nine-year compulsory education, what mean is "compulsory"?
sentences.chinese: 九年制义务教育，这个义务是强制的意思。

definition: percentage of children who enter school
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
